articles.title: Google Launches Gemini 3 with New Coding App and Record Benchmark Scores
articles.shortDescription: Google unveils Gemini 3, its most powerful AI model yet, featuring breakthrough coding capabilities and industry-leading benchmark performance.
articles.fullSummary: Google has launched Gemini 3, marking a significant leap forward in AI capabilities. The new model achieves record-breaking scores across multiple industry benchmarks, demonstrating substantial improvements in reasoning, code generation, and multimodal understanding. Alongside the model release, Google introduced a new dedicated coding application that leverages Gemini 3's advanced capabilities to assist developers with complex programming tasks, code review, and architectural design. Early testing shows the model outperforming competitors in code optimization, bug detection, and generating production-ready code across multiple programming languages.
